Prerequisite: NUR1118 Anatomy and Physiology II is removed.
Preclusion: NUR2115 Comprehensive Health Assessment is precluded.
ModuleDescription: Providing a holistic framework for contemporary nursing practice, the module encourages students to use critical thinking and problem solving skills to apply knowledge and skills of comprehensive health assessment to diverse clinical situations.
Department: Nursing/Alice Lee Ctr For Nursing Stud
